section_title: Inclusion of forests in exhaustion under the CDM
sentences: This issue was first taken up by the SBSTA plenary on 31 May.
It was subsequently considered through informal consultations facilitated by Eduardo Sanhueza (Chile).

In informal consultations, a party presented on the definition of lands with forests in exhaustion and answered questions on the implications of the inclusion of reforestation of these lands as CDM project activities.
At the closing plenary, Facilitator Sanhueza reported that no agreement was reached and the issue will be taken up again at SBSTA 33.
